pages.text: Here are the structures that spawn in the overworld, more info on the structures page

pages.title: Camp Site
pages.text: Camp Sites generate all over forests, jungles, savannas, taigas, and plains. They contain at least two hunters, you can find some supplies in there.

pages.title: Croaker Village
pages.text: These villages spawn rarely in the swamp biome, there are some goodies to look out for!

pages.title: Pirate Ship
pages.text: These filthy rich pirates spawn all over your oceans now, beware though they are strong! and obviously has some treasure.

pages.title: Suspecious Chest
pages.text: They generate all over the overworld, best to experience it for yourself.

pages.title: Void Gateway
pages.text: They generate everywhere but at the bottom of your world, it contains the portal block to void

pages.title: Corruption
pages.text: The world is getting corrupted! Corruptions are found rarely, it is the gateway to the Corruption and is being guarded by an unknown entity.
